text: "Magnolia" is the fourth single from American rapper Playboi Carti's first self-titled mixtape. The song was released on June 13, 2017. The song was able to make it to #7 on the Billboard Hot Rap Songs, #11 on the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs, and #29 on the Billboard Hot 100 charts. It was also certified 3Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song is named after the Magnolia housing projects in New Orleans. The music video features Carti dancing and rapping in the streets of New York before partying in a club with A$AP Rocky. He gets his hair cut at a barbershop and shoots somebody outside of the shop. He runs from police they then gets arrested at the end. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2017 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Magnolia (song)
